thread.title: Three Effective Techniques for Climbing a Rope
thread.title_full: Three Effective Techniques for Climbing a Rope

author: Patrick Allan
title: Three Effective Techniques for Climbing a Rope
text:
You may not have gym class anymore, but rope climbing can still be a good workout. And knowing how to climb a rope could be an invaluable skill in some emergency situations. Here are a few methods you can practice. Advertisement 
This graphic from Ted Slampyak and The Art of Manliness show you how to do the three most popular climbing techniques. There’s the basic gym class technique that you’ve probably done before, the S-Wrap technique that’s used by the U.S. Marines, and lastly the BUD/S technique used by the U.S. Navy SEALs. Try all three and see which feels the most comfortable for you, then practice, practice, practice. 
How to Climb a Rope | The Art of Manliness Advertisement
